mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ecb_account ( as_id, user_id, app_name, user_name, password, remark, create_time, update_time, yn ) VALUES ( #{asId}, #{userId}, #{appName}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{remark}, now(), now(), 1 )
mapper.update:

app_name = #{appName}, user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, remark = #{remark}, update_time = now()
WHERE as_id = #{asId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND yn = 1
